description: You will learn concepts like data types, variables, loops, and conditional statements.
You have to select a programming language like Python, Java, or JavaScript and learning the basics of that language.
You will learn concepts like arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, sorting algorithms, and searching algorithms.
You will learn writing simple programs that demonstrate the concepts covered in the previous steps.
You will learn building larger programs that require the student to use the concepts they've learned in a more complex and integrated manner.
